5600 -    def SelectItemRange(self, item1, item2): 

5601          """ 
5602          Selects all the items between `item1` and `item2`. 
5603   
5604          :param `item1`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}, representing the first 
5605           item in the range to select; 
5606          :param `item2`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}, representing the last 
5607           item in the range to select. 
5608   
5609          :raise: `Exception` if used without the ``TR_EXTENDED`` or ``TR_MULTIPLE`` style set. 
5610           
5611          :note: This method can be used only if L{CustomTreeCtrl} has the ``TR_MULTIPLE`` or ``TR_EXTENDED`` 
5612           style set.          
5613          """ 
5614   
5615          if not self.HasAGWFlag(TR_MULTIPLE) and not self.HasAGWFlag(TR_EXTENDED): 
5616              raise Exception("SelectItemRange can be used only with multiple selection enabled.") 
5617           
5618          self._select_me = None 
5619   
5620          # item2 is not necessary after item1 
5621          # choice first' and 'last' between item1 and item2 
5622          first = (item1.GetY() < item2.GetY() and [item1] or [item2])[0] 
5623          last = (item1.GetY() < item2.GetY() and [item2] or [item1])[0] 
5624   
5625          select = self._current.IsSelected() 
5626   
5627          if self.TagAllChildrenUntilLast(first, last, select): 
5628              return 
5629   
5630          self.TagNextChildren(first, last, select) 

5631   
5632   

5633 -    def DoSelectItem(self, item, unselect_others=True, extended_select=False): 

5634          """ 
5635          Actually selects/unselects an item, sending ``EVT_TREE_SEL_CHANGING`` and 
5636          ``EVT_TREE_SEL_CHANGED`` events. 
5637   
5638          :param `item`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}; 
5639          :param bool `unselect_others`: if ``True``, all the other selected items are 
5640           unselected. 
5641          :param bool `extended_select`: ``True`` if the L{CustomTreeCtrl} is using the 
5642           ``TR_EXTENDED`` style. 
5643          """ 
5644   
5645          self._select_me = None 
5646   
5647          is_single = not (self.GetAGWWindowStyleFlag() & TR_MULTIPLE) 
5648   
5649          # to keep going anyhow !!! 
5650          if is_single: 
5651              if item.IsSelected(): 
5652                  # Handles hypertext items 
5653                  self.HandleHyperLink(item) 
5654                  return # nothing else to do 
5655              unselect_others = True 
5656              extended_select = False 
5657           
5658          elif unselect_others and item.IsSelected(): 
5659           
5660              # selection change if there is more than one item currently selected 
5661              if len(self.GetSelections()) == 1: 
5662                  # Handles hypertext items 
5663                  self.HandleHyperLink(item) 
5664                  return 
5665   
5666          event = TreeEvent(wxEVT_TREE_SEL_CHANGING, self.GetId()) 
5667          event._item = item 
5668          event._itemOld = self._current 
5669          event.SetEventObject(self) 
5670          # TODO : Here we don't send any selection mode yet ! 
5671   
5672          if self.GetEventHandler().ProcessEvent(event) and not event.IsAllowed(): 
5673              return 
5674   
5675          parent = self.GetItemParent(item) 
5676          while parent: 
5677              if not self.IsExpanded(parent): 
5678                  self.Expand(parent) 
5679   
5680              parent = self.GetItemParent(parent) 
5681           
5682          # ctrl press 
5683          if unselect_others: 
5684              if is_single: 
5685                  self.Unselect() # to speed up thing 
5686              else: 
5687                  self.UnselectAll() 
5688   
5689          # shift press 
5690          if extended_select: 
5691              if not self._current: 
5692                  self._current = self._key_current = self.GetRootItem() 
5693               
5694              # don't change the mark (self._current) 
5695              self.SelectItemRange(self._current, item) 
5696           
5697          else: 
5698           
5699              select = True # the default 
5700   
5701              # Check if we need to toggle hilight (ctrl mode) 
5702              if not unselect_others: 
5703                  select = not item.IsSelected() 
5704   
5705              self._current = self._key_current = item 
5706              self._current.SetHilight(select) 
5707              self.RefreshLine(self._current) 
5708           
5709          # This can cause idle processing to select the root 
5710          # if no item is selected, so it must be after the 
5711          # selection is set 
5712          self.EnsureVisible(item) 
5713   
5714          event.SetEventType(wxEVT_TREE_SEL_CHANGED) 
5715          self.GetEventHandler().ProcessEvent(event) 
5716   
5717          # Handles hypertext items 
5718          self.HandleHyperLink(item) 

5719           
5720   

5721 -    def SelectItem(self, item, select=True): 

5722          """ 
5723          Selects/deselects an item. 
5724   
5725          :param `item`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}; 
5726          :param bool `select`: ``True`` to select an item, ``False`` to deselect it. 
5727          """ 
5728           
5729          if select: 
5730           
5731              self.DoSelectItem(item, not self.HasAGWFlag(TR_MULTIPLE)) 
5732           
5733          else: # deselect 
5734           
5735              item.SetHilight(False) 
5736              self.RefreshLine(item) 

5737   
5738       

5739 -    def FillArray(self, item, array=[]): 

5740          """ 
5741          Internal function. Used to populate an array of selected items when 
5742          the style ``TR_MULTIPLE`` is used. 
5743   
5744          :param `item`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}; 
5745          :param list `array`: a Python list containing the selected items. 
5746   
5747          :return: A Python list containing the selected items. 
5748          """ 
5749   
5750          if not array: 
5751              array = [] 
5752               
5753          if item.IsSelected(): 
5754              array.append(item) 
5755   
5756          if item.HasChildren() and item.IsExpanded(): 
5757              for child in item.GetChildren(): 
5758                  array = self.FillArray(child, array) 
5759           
5760          return array 

5761       
5762   

5763 -    def GetSelections(self): 

5764          """ 
5765          Returns a list of selected items. 
5766   
5767          :note: This method can be used only if L{CustomTreeCtrl} has the ``TR_MULTIPLE`` or ``TR_EXTENDED`` 
5768           style set. 
5769   
5770          :return: A Python list containing the selected items, all instances of L{GenericTreeItem}. 
5771          """ 
5772   
5773          array = [] 
5774          idRoot = self.GetRootItem() 
5775          if idRoot: 
5776              array = self.FillArray(idRoot, array) 
5777           
5778          #else: the tree is empty, so no selections 
5779   
5780          return array 

5781   
5782   

5783 -    def HandleHyperLink(self, item): 

5784          """ 
5785          Handles the hyperlink items, sending the ``EVT_TREE_ITEM_HYPERLINK`` event. 
5786   
5787          :param `item`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}.         
5788          """ 
5789   
5790          if self.IsItemHyperText(item): 
5791              event = TreeEvent(wxEVT_TREE_ITEM_HYPERLINK, self.GetId()) 
5792              event._item = item 
5793              self.GetEventHandler().ProcessEvent(event) 

5794           
5795   

5796 -    def EnsureVisible(self, item): 

5797          """ 
5798          Scrolls and/or expands items to ensure that the given item is visible. 
5799   
5800          :param `item`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}. 
5801          """ 
5802   
5803          # first expand all parent branches 
5804          parent = item.GetParent() 
5805   
5806          if self.HasAGWFlag(TR_HIDE_ROOT): 
5807              while parent and parent != self._anchor: 
5808                  self.Expand(parent) 
5809                  parent = parent.GetParent() 
5810          else: 
5811              while parent: 
5812                  self.Expand(parent) 
5813                  parent = parent.GetParent() 
5814               
5815          self.ScrollTo(item) 

5816   
5817   

5818 -    def ScrollTo(self, item): 

5819          """ 
5820          Scrolls the specified item into view. 
5821   
5822          :param `item`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}. 
5823          """ 
5824   
5825          if not item: 
5826              return 
5827   
5828          # We have to call this here because the label in 
5829          # question might just have been added and no screen 
5830          # update taken place. 
5831          if self._dirty: 
5832              if wx.Platform in ["__WXMSW__", "__WXMAC__"]: 
5833                  self.Update() 
5834          else: 
5835              wx.YieldIfNeeded() 
5836   
5837          # now scroll to the item 
5838          item_y = item.GetY() 
5839          start_x, start_y = self.GetViewStart() 
5840          start_y *= _PIXELS_PER_UNIT 
5841   
5842          client_w, client_h = self.GetClientSize() 
5843   
5844          x, y = 0, 0 
5845   
5846          if item_y < start_y+3: 
5847           
5848              # going down 
5849              x, y = self._anchor.GetSize(x, y, self) 
5850              y += _PIXELS_PER_UNIT + 2 # one more scrollbar unit + 2 pixels 
5851              x += _PIXELS_PER_UNIT + 2 # one more scrollbar unit + 2 pixels 
5852              x_pos = self.GetScrollPos(wx.HORIZONTAL) 
5853              # Item should appear at top 
5854              self.SetScrollbars(_PIXELS_PER_UNIT, _PIXELS_PER_UNIT, x/_PIXELS_PER_UNIT, y/_PIXELS_PER_UNIT, x_pos, item_y/_PIXELS_PER_UNIT) 
5855           
5856          elif item_y+self.GetLineHeight(item) > start_y+client_h: 
5857           
5858              # going up 
5859              x, y = self._anchor.GetSize(x, y, self) 
5860              y += _PIXELS_PER_UNIT + 2 # one more scrollbar unit + 2 pixels 
5861              x += _PIXELS_PER_UNIT + 2 # one more scrollbar unit + 2 pixels 
5862              item_y += _PIXELS_PER_UNIT+2 
5863              x_pos = self.GetScrollPos(wx.HORIZONTAL) 
5864              # Item should appear at bottom 
5865              self.SetScrollbars(_PIXELS_PER_UNIT, _PIXELS_PER_UNIT, x/_PIXELS_PER_UNIT, y/_PIXELS_PER_UNIT, x_pos, (item_y+self.GetLineHeight(item)-client_h)/_PIXELS_PER_UNIT ) 

5866   
5867   

5868 -    def OnCompareItems(self, item1, item2): 

5869          """ 
5870          Returns whether 2 items have the same text. 
5871           
5872          Override this function in the derived class to change the sort order of the items 
5873          in the L{CustomTreeCtrl}. The function should return a negative, zero or positive 
5874          value if the first item is less than, equal to or greater than the second one. 
5875   
5876          :param `item1`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}; 
5877          :param `item2`: another instance of L{GenericTreeItem}. 
5878   
5879          :return: The return value is negative if `item1` < `item2`, zero if `item1` == `item2` 
5880           and strictly positive if `item1` < `item2`. 
5881           
5882          :note: The base class version compares items alphabetically. 
5883          """ 
5884   
5885          return cmp(self.GetItemText(item1), self.GetItemText(item2)) 

5886   
5887   

5888 -    def SortChildren(self, item): 

5889          """ 
5890          Sorts the children of the given item using the L{OnCompareItems} method of 
5891          L{CustomTreeCtrl}.  
5892   
5893          :param `item`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}. 
5894           
5895          :note: You should override the L{OnCompareItems} method in your derived class to change 
5896           the sort order (the default is ascending case-sensitive alphabetical order). 
5897          """ 
5898   
5899          children = item.GetChildren() 
5900           
5901          if len(children) > 1: 
5902              self._dirty = True 
5903              children.sort(self.OnCompareItems)

5960 -    def CalculateLineHeight(self): 

5961          """ Calculates the height of a line. """ 
5962   
5963          dc = wx.ClientDC(self) 
5964          self._lineHeight = dc.GetCharHeight()  
5965   
5966          if self._imageListNormal: 
5967           
5968              # Calculate a self._lineHeight value from the normal Image sizes. 
5969              # May be toggle off. Then CustomTreeCtrl will spread when 
5970              # necessary (which might look ugly). 
5971              n = self._imageListNormal.GetImageCount() 
5972   
5973              for i in xrange(n): 
5974               
5975                  width, height = self._imageListNormal.GetSize(i) 
5976   
5977                  if height > self._lineHeight: 
5978                      self._lineHeight = height 
5979               
5980          if self._imageListButtons: 
5981           
5982              # Calculate a self._lineHeight value from the Button image sizes. 
5983              # May be toggle off. Then CustomTreeCtrl will spread when 
5984              # necessary (which might look ugly). 
5985              n = self._imageListButtons.GetImageCount() 
5986   
5987              for i in xrange(n): 
5988               
5989                  width, height = self._imageListButtons.GetSize(i) 
5990   
5991                  if height > self._lineHeight: 
5992                      self._lineHeight = height 
5993   
5994          if self._imageListCheck: 
5995           
5996              # Calculate a self._lineHeight value from the check/radio image sizes. 
5997              # May be toggle off. Then CustomTreeCtrl will spread when 
5998              # necessary (which might look ugly). 
5999              n = self._imageListCheck.GetImageCount() 
6000   
6001              for i in xrange(n): 
6002               
6003                  width, height = self._imageListCheck.GetSize(i) 
6004   
6005                  if height > self._lineHeight: 
6006                      self._lineHeight = height 
6007   
6008          if self._imageListLeft: 
6009           
6010              # Calculate a self._lineHeight value from the leftmost image sizes. 
6011              # May be toggle off. Then CustomTreeCtrl will spread when 
6012              # necessary (which might look ugly). 
6013              n = self._imageListLeft.GetImageCount() 
6014   
6015              for i in xrange(n): 
6016               
6017                  width, height = self._imageListLeft.GetSize(i) 
6018   
6019                  if height > self._lineHeight: 
6020                      self._lineHeight = height 
6021           
6022          if self._lineHeight < 30: 
6023              self._lineHeight += 2                 # at least 2 pixels 
6024          else: 
6025              self._lineHeight += self._lineHeight/10   # otherwise 10% extra spacing 

6026   
6027   

6028 -    def SetImageList(self, imageList): 

6029          """ 
6030          Sets the normal image list for L{CustomTreeCtrl}. 
6031   
6032          :param `imageList`: an instance of `wx.ImageList`. 
6033          """ 
6034   
6035          if self._ownsImageListNormal: 
6036              del self._imageListNormal 
6037               
6038          self._imageListNormal = imageList 
6039          self._ownsImageListNormal = False 
6040          self._dirty = True 
6041           
6042          # Don't do any drawing if we're setting the list to NULL, 
6043          # since we may be in the process of deleting the tree control. 
6044          if imageList: 
6045              self.CalculateLineHeight() 
6046   
6047              # We gray out the image list to use the grayed icons with disabled items 
6048              sz = imageList.GetSize(0) 
6049              self._grayedImageList = wx.ImageList(sz[0], sz[1], True, 0) 
6050   
6051              for ii in xrange(imageList.GetImageCount()): 
6052                  bmp = imageList.GetBitmap(ii) 
6053                  newbmp = MakeDisabledBitmap(bmp) 
6054                  self._grayedImageList.Add(newbmp) 

6055   
6056

6247 -    def AdjustMyScrollbars(self): 

6248          """ Internal method used to adjust the `wx.PyScrolledWindow` scrollbars. """ 
6249   
6250          if self._anchor: 
6251           
6252              x, y = self._anchor.GetSize(0, 0, self) 
6253              y += _PIXELS_PER_UNIT + 2 # one more scrollbar unit + 2 pixels 
6254              x += _PIXELS_PER_UNIT + 2 # one more scrollbar unit + 2 pixels 
6255              x_pos = self.GetScrollPos(wx.HORIZONTAL) 
6256              y_pos = self.GetScrollPos(wx.VERTICAL) 
6257              self.SetScrollbars(_PIXELS_PER_UNIT, _PIXELS_PER_UNIT, x/_PIXELS_PER_UNIT, y/_PIXELS_PER_UNIT, x_pos, y_pos) 
6258           
6259          else: 
6260           
6261              self.SetScrollbars(0, 0, 0, 0)

6264 -    def GetLineHeight(self, item): 

6265          """ 
6266          Returns the line height for the given item. 
6267   
6268          :param `item`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}. 
6269   
6270          :return: the item height, in pixels.         
6271          """ 
6272   
6273          if self.GetAGWWindowStyleFlag() & TR_HAS_VARIABLE_ROW_HEIGHT: 
6274              return int(item.GetHeight()) 
6275          else: 
6276              return int(self._lineHeight)

6279 -    def DrawVerticalGradient(self, dc, rect, hasfocus): 

6280          """ 
6281          Gradient fill from colour 1 to colour 2 from top to bottom. 
6282   
6283          :param `dc`: an instance of `wx.DC`; 
6284          :param `wx.Rect` `rect`: the rectangle to be filled with the gradient shading; 
6285          :param bool `hasfocus`: ``True`` if the main L{CustomTreeCtrl} has focus, ``False`` 
6286           otherwise. 
6287          """ 
6288   
6289          oldpen = dc.GetPen() 
6290          oldbrush = dc.GetBrush() 
6291          dc.SetPen(wx.TRANSPARENT_PEN) 
6292   
6293          # calculate gradient coefficients 
6294          if hasfocus: 
6295              col2 = self._secondcolour 
6296              col1 = self._firstcolour 
6297          else: 
6298              col2 = self._hilightUnfocusedBrush.GetColour() 
6299              col1 = self._hilightUnfocusedBrush2.GetColour() 
6300   
6301          r1, g1, b1 = int(col1.Red()), int(col1.Green()), int(col1.Blue()) 
6302          r2, g2, b2 = int(col2.Red()), int(col2.Green()), int(col2.Blue()) 
6303   
6304          flrect = float(rect.height) 
6305   
6306          rstep = float((r2 - r1)) / flrect 
6307          gstep = float((g2 - g1)) / flrect 
6308          bstep = float((b2 - b1)) / flrect 
6309   
6310          rf, gf, bf = 0, 0, 0 
6311           
6312          for y in xrange(rect.y, rect.y + rect.height): 
6313              currCol = (r1 + rf, g1 + gf, b1 + bf)                 
6314              dc.SetBrush(wx.Brush(currCol, wx.SOLID)) 
6315              dc.DrawRectangle(rect.x, y, rect.width, 1) 
6316              rf = rf + rstep 
6317              gf = gf + gstep 
6318              bf = bf + bstep 
6319           
6320          dc.SetPen(oldpen) 
6321          dc.SetBrush(wx.TRANSPARENT_BRUSH) 
6322          dc.DrawRectangleRect(rect) 
6323          dc.SetBrush(oldbrush) 

6324   
6325   

6326 -    def DrawHorizontalGradient(self, dc, rect, hasfocus): 

6327          """ 
6328          Gradient fill from colour 1 to colour 2 from left to right. 
6329   
6330          :param `dc`: an instance of `wx.DC`; 
6331          :param `wx.Rect` `rect`: the rectangle to be filled with the gradient shading; 
6332          :param bool `hasfocus`: ``True`` if the main L{CustomTreeCtrl} has focus, ``False`` 
6333           otherwise. 
6334          """ 
6335   
6336          oldpen = dc.GetPen() 
6337          oldbrush = dc.GetBrush() 
6338          dc.SetPen(wx.TRANSPARENT_PEN) 
6339   
6340          # calculate gradient coefficients 
6341   
6342          if hasfocus: 
6343              col2 = self._secondcolour 
6344              col1 = self._firstcolour 
6345          else: 
6346              col2 = self._hilightUnfocusedBrush.GetColour() 
6347              col1 = self._hilightUnfocusedBrush2.GetColour() 
6348   
6349          r1, g1, b1 = int(col1.Red()), int(col1.Green()), int(col1.Blue()) 
6350          r2, g2, b2 = int(col2.Red()), int(col2.Green()), int(col2.Blue()) 
6351   
6352          flrect = float(rect.width) 
6353   
6354          rstep = float((r2 - r1)) / flrect 
6355          gstep = float((g2 - g1)) / flrect 
6356          bstep = float((b2 - b1)) / flrect 
6357   
6358          rf, gf, bf = 0, 0, 0 
6359   
6360          for x in xrange(rect.x, rect.x + rect.width): 
6361              currCol = (int(r1 + rf), int(g1 + gf), int(b1 + bf)) 
6362              dc.SetBrush(wx.Brush(currCol, wx.SOLID)) 
6363              dc.DrawRectangle(x, rect.y, 1, rect.height) 
6364              rf = rf + rstep 
6365              gf = gf + gstep 
6366              bf = bf + bstep 
6367   
6368          dc.SetPen(oldpen) 
6369          dc.SetBrush(wx.TRANSPARENT_BRUSH) 
6370          dc.DrawRectangleRect(rect) 
6371          dc.SetBrush(oldbrush) 

6372

6374 -    def DrawVistaRectangle(self, dc, rect, hasfocus): 

6375          """ 
6376          Draws the selected item(s) with the Windows Vista style. 
6377   
6378          :param `dc`: an instance of `wx.DC`; 
6379          :param `wx.Rect` `rect`: the rectangle to be filled with the gradient shading; 
6380          :param bool `hasfocus`: ``True`` if the main L{CustomTreeCtrl} has focus, ``False`` 
6381           otherwise. 
6382          """ 
6383   
6384          if hasfocus: 
6385               
6386              outer = _rgbSelectOuter 
6387              inner = _rgbSelectInner 
6388              top = _rgbSelectTop 
6389              bottom = _rgbSelectBottom 
6390   
6391          else: 
6392               
6393              outer = _rgbNoFocusOuter 
6394              inner = _rgbNoFocusInner 
6395              top = _rgbNoFocusTop 
6396              bottom = _rgbNoFocusBottom 
6397   
6398          oldpen = dc.GetPen() 
6399          oldbrush = dc.GetBrush() 
6400   
6401          bdrRect = wx.Rect(*rect.Get()) 
6402          filRect = wx.Rect(*rect.Get()) 
6403          filRect.Deflate(1,1) 
6404           
6405          r1, g1, b1 = int(top.Red()), int(top.Green()), int(top.Blue()) 
6406          r2, g2, b2 = int(bottom.Red()), int(bottom.Green()), int(bottom.Blue()) 
6407   
6408          flrect = float(filRect.height) 
6409          if flrect < 1: 
6410              flrect = self._lineHeight 
6411   
6412          rstep = float((r2 - r1)) / flrect 
6413          gstep = float((g2 - g1)) / flrect 
6414          bstep = float((b2 - b1)) / flrect 
6415   
6416          rf, gf, bf = 0, 0, 0 
6417          dc.SetPen(wx.TRANSPARENT_PEN) 
6418           
6419          for y in xrange(filRect.y, filRect.y + filRect.height): 
6420              currCol = (r1 + rf, g1 + gf, b1 + bf) 
6421              dc.SetBrush(wx.Brush(currCol, wx.SOLID)) 
6422              dc.DrawRectangle(filRect.x, y, filRect.width, 1) 
6423              rf = rf + rstep 
6424              gf = gf + gstep 
6425              bf = bf + bstep 
6426           
6427          dc.SetBrush(wx.TRANSPARENT_BRUSH) 
6428          dc.SetPen(wx.Pen(outer)) 
6429          dc.DrawRoundedRectangleRect(bdrRect, 3) 
6430          bdrRect.Deflate(1, 1) 
6431          dc.SetPen(wx.Pen(inner)) 
6432          dc.DrawRoundedRectangleRect(bdrRect, 2) 
6433   
6434          dc.SetPen(oldpen) 
6435          dc.SetBrush(oldbrush) 

6436   
6437   

6438 -    def PaintItem(self, item, dc, level, align): 

6439          """ 
6440          Actually draws an item. 
6441   
6442          :param `item`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}; 
6443          :param `dc`: an instance of `wx.DC`; 
6444          :param integer `level`: the item level in the tree hierarchy; 
6445          :param integer `align`: an integer specifying the alignment type: 
6446   
6447           =============== ========================================= 
6448           `align` Value   Description 
6449           =============== ========================================= 
6450                  0        No horizontal alignment of windows (in items with windows). 
6451                  1        Windows (in items with windows) are aligned at the same horizontal position. 
6452                  2        Windows (in items with windows) are aligned at the rightmost edge of L{CustomTreeCtrl}. 
6453           =============== ========================================= 
6454          """ 
6455   
6456          attr = item.GetAttributes() 
6457           
6458          if attr and attr.HasFont(): 
6459              dc.SetFont(attr.GetFont()) 
6460          else: 
6461              if item.IsBold(): 
6462                  dc.SetFont(self._boldFont) 
6463              elif item.IsItalic(): 
6464                  dc.SetFont(self._italicFont) 
6465          if item.IsHyperText(): 
6466              dc.SetFont(self.GetHyperTextFont()) 
6467              if item.GetVisited(): 
6468                  dc.SetTextForeground(self.GetHyperTextVisitedColour()) 
6469              else: 
6470                  dc.SetTextForeground(self.GetHyperTextNewColour()) 
6471                       
6472          text_w, text_h, dummy = dc.GetMultiLineTextExtent(item.GetText()) 
6473          w, h = self.GetClientSize() 
6474           
6475          image = item.GetCurrentImage() 
6476          checkimage = item.GetCurrentCheckedImage() 
6477          leftimage = _NO_IMAGE 
6478          separator = item.IsSeparator() 
6479           
6480          if self._imageListLeft: 
6481              leftimage = item.GetLeftImage() 
6482               
6483          image_w, image_h = 0, 0 
6484   
6485          if image != _NO_IMAGE: 
6486           
6487              if self._imageListNormal: 
6488               
6489                  image_w, image_h = self._imageListNormal.GetSize(image) 
6490                  image_w += 4 
6491               
6492              else: 
6493               
6494                  image = _NO_IMAGE 
6495   
6496          if item.GetType() != 0: 
6497              wcheck, hcheck = self._imageListCheck.GetSize(item.GetType()) 
6498              wcheck += 4 
6499          else: 
6500              wcheck, hcheck = 0, 0 
6501   
6502          if leftimage != _NO_IMAGE: 
6503              l_image_w, l_image_h = self._imageListLeft.GetSize(leftimage) 
6504               
6505          total_h = self.GetLineHeight(item) 
6506          drawItemBackground = False 
6507               
6508          if item.IsSelected(): 
6509           
6510              # under mac selections are only a rectangle in case they don't have the focus 
6511              if wx.Platform == "__WXMAC__": 
6512                  if not self._hasFocus: 
6513                      dc.SetBrush(wx.TRANSPARENT_BRUSH)  
6514                      dc.SetPen(wx.Pen(wx.SystemSettings_GetColour(wx.SYS_COLOUR_HIGHLIGHT), 1, wx.SOLID))  
6515                  else: 
6516                      dc.SetBrush(self._hilightBrush)  
6517              else: 
6518                      dc.SetBrush((self._hasFocus and [self._hilightBrush] or [self._hilightUnfocusedBrush])[0]) 
6519                      drawItemBackground = True 
6520          else: 
6521              if attr and attr.HasBackgroundColour(): 
6522                  drawItemBackground = True 
6523                  colBg = attr.GetBackgroundColour() 
6524              else: 
6525                  colBg = self._backgroundColour 
6526               
6527              dc.SetBrush(wx.Brush(colBg, wx.SOLID)) 
6528              dc.SetPen(wx.TRANSPARENT_PEN) 
6529           
6530          offset = (self.HasAGWFlag(TR_ROW_LINES) and [1] or [0])[0] 
6531           
6532          if self.HasAGWFlag(TR_FULL_ROW_HIGHLIGHT): 
6533              x = 0 
6534   
6535              itemrect = wx.Rect(x, item.GetY()+offset, w, total_h-offset) 
6536               
6537              if item.IsSelected(): 
6538                  if self._usegradients: 
6539                      if self._gradientstyle == 0:   # Horizontal 
6540                          self.DrawHorizontalGradient(dc, itemrect, self._hasFocus) 
6541                      else:                          # Vertical 
6542                          self.DrawVerticalGradient(dc, itemrect, self._hasFocus) 
6543                  elif self._vistaselection: 
6544                      self.DrawVistaRectangle(dc, itemrect, self._hasFocus) 
6545                  else: 
6546                      if wx.Platform in ["__WXGTK2__", "__WXMAC__"]: 
6547                          flags = wx.CONTROL_SELECTED 
6548                          if self._hasFocus: flags = flags | wx.CONTROL_FOCUSED 
6549                          wx.RendererNative.Get().DrawItemSelectionRect(self, dc, itemrect, flags)  
6550                      else: 
6551                          dc.DrawRectangleRect(itemrect) 
6552              else: 
6553                 if drawItemBackground: 
6554                     minusicon = wcheck + image_w - 2 
6555                     itemrect = wx.Rect(item.GetX()+minusicon, 
6556                                        item.GetY()+offset, 
6557                                        item.GetWidth()-minusicon, 
6558                                        total_h-offset) 
6559                     dc.DrawRectangleRect(itemrect) 
6560                   
6561          else: 
6562   
6563              if item.IsSelected(): 
6564               
6565                  # If it's selected, and there's an image, then we should 
6566                  # take care to leave the area under the image painted in the 
6567                  # background colour. 
6568   
6569                  wnd = item.GetWindow() 
6570                  wndx = 0 
6571                  if wnd: 
6572                      wndx, wndy = item.GetWindowSize() 
6573   
6574                  if separator: 
6575                      item_width = w 
6576                  else: 
6577                      item_width = item.GetWidth() - image_w - wcheck + 2 - wndx 
6578                       
6579                  itemrect = wx.Rect(item.GetX() + wcheck + image_w - 2, 
6580                                     item.GetY()+offset, 
6581                                     item_width, 
6582                                     total_h-offset) 
6583   
6584                  if self._usegradients: 
6585                      if self._gradientstyle == 0:   # Horizontal 
6586                          self.DrawHorizontalGradient(dc, itemrect, self._hasFocus) 
6587                      else:                          # Vertical 
6588                          self.DrawVerticalGradient(dc, itemrect, self._hasFocus) 
6589                  elif self._vistaselection: 
6590                      self.DrawVistaRectangle(dc, itemrect, self._hasFocus) 
6591                  else: 
6592                      if wx.Platform in ["__WXGTK2__", "__WXMAC__"]: 
6593                          flags = wx.CONTROL_SELECTED 
6594                          if self._hasFocus: flags = flags | wx.CONTROL_FOCUSED 
6595                          wx.RendererNative.Get().DrawItemSelectionRect(self, dc, itemrect, flags)  
6596                      else: 
6597                          dc.DrawRectangleRect(itemrect) 
6598                               
6599              # On GTK+ 2, drawing a 'normal' background is wrong for themes that 
6600              # don't allow backgrounds to be customized. Not drawing the background, 
6601              # except for custom item backgrounds, works for both kinds of theme. 
6602              elif drawItemBackground: 
6603   
6604                  minusicon = wcheck + image_w - 2 
6605   
6606                  if separator: 
6607                      item_width = w 
6608                  else: 
6609                      item_width = item.GetWidth()-minusicon, 
6610                   
6611                  itemrect = wx.Rect(item.GetX()+minusicon, 
6612                                     item.GetY()+offset, 
6613                                     item_width, 
6614                                     total_h-offset) 
6615                                   
6616                  if self._usegradients and self._hasFocus: 
6617                      if self._gradientstyle == 0:   # Horizontal 
6618                          self.DrawHorizontalGradient(dc, itemrect, self._hasFocus) 
6619                      else:                          # Vertical 
6620                          self.DrawVerticalGradient(dc, itemrect, self._hasFocus) 
6621                  else: 
6622                      dc.DrawRectangleRect(itemrect) 
6623                           
6624          if image != _NO_IMAGE: 
6625           
6626              dc.SetClippingRegion(item.GetX(), item.GetY(), wcheck+image_w-2, total_h) 
6627              if item.IsEnabled(): 
6628                  imglist = self._imageListNormal 
6629              else: 
6630                  imglist = self._grayedImageList 
6631   
6632              imglist.Draw(image, dc, 
6633                           item.GetX() + wcheck, 
6634                           item.GetY() + ((total_h > image_h) and [(total_h-image_h)/2] or [0])[0], 
6635                           wx.IMAGELIST_DRAW_TRANSPARENT) 
6636               
6637              dc.DestroyClippingRegion() 
6638   
6639          if wcheck: 
6640              if item.IsEnabled(): 
6641                  imglist = self._imageListCheck 
6642              else: 
6643                  imglist = self._grayedCheckList 
6644                   
6645              imglist.Draw(checkimage, dc, 
6646                           item.GetX(), 
6647                           item.GetY() + ((total_h > hcheck) and [(total_h-hcheck)/2] or [0])[0], 
6648                           wx.IMAGELIST_DRAW_TRANSPARENT) 
6649   
6650          if leftimage != _NO_IMAGE: 
6651              if item.IsEnabled(): 
6652                  imglist = self._imageListLeft 
6653              else: 
6654                  imglist = self._grayedImageListLeft 
6655   
6656              imglist.Draw(leftimage, dc, 
6657                           4, 
6658                           item.GetY() + ((total_h > l_image_h) and [(total_h-l_image_h)/2] or [0])[0], 
6659                           wx.IMAGELIST_DRAW_TRANSPARENT) 
6660   
6661          dc.SetBackgroundMode(wx.TRANSPARENT) 
6662          extraH = ((total_h > text_h) and [(total_h - text_h)/2] or [0])[0] 
6663   
6664          textrect = wx.Rect(wcheck + image_w + item.GetX(), item.GetY() + extraH, text_w, text_h) 
6665   
6666          itemText = item.GetText() 
6667          if self.HasAGWFlag(TR_ELLIPSIZE_LONG_ITEMS) and not separator: 
6668              xa, ya = self.CalcScrolledPosition((0, item.GetY())) 
6669              maxsize = w - (wcheck + image_w + item.GetX()) + xa 
6670              itemText = ChopText(dc, itemText, maxsize) 
6671           
6672          if not item.IsEnabled(): 
6673              foreground = dc.GetTextForeground() 
6674              dc.SetTextForeground(self._disabledColour) 
6675              dc.DrawLabel(itemText, textrect) 
6676              dc.SetTextForeground(foreground) 
6677          else: 
6678              if wx.Platform == "__WXMAC__" and item.IsSelected() and self._hasFocus: 
6679                  dc.SetTextForeground(wx.WHITE) 
6680              dc.DrawLabel(itemText, textrect) 
6681   
6682          wnd = item.GetWindow() 
6683          if wnd: 
6684              wndx = wcheck + image_w + item.GetX() + text_w + 4 
6685              xa, ya = self.CalcScrolledPosition((0, item.GetY())) 
6686              wndx += xa 
6687              if item.GetHeight() > item.GetWindowSize()[1]: 
6688                  ya += (item.GetHeight() - item.GetWindowSize()[1])/2 
6689   
6690              if align == 1: 
6691                  # Horizontal alignment of windows 
6692                  if level in self.absoluteWindows: 
6693                      wndx = self.absoluteWindows[level] + item.GetX() + 2 + xa 
6694                       
6695              elif align == 2: 
6696                  # Rightmost alignment of windows 
6697                  wndx = w - item.GetWindowSize().x - 2 + xa 
6698                   
6699              if not wnd.IsShown(): 
6700                  wnd.Show() 
6701              if wnd.GetPosition() != (wndx, ya): 
6702                  wnd.SetPosition((wndx, ya)) 
6703   
6704          if separator: 
6705              oldPen = dc.GetPen() 
6706   
6707              if item.IsEnabled(): 
6708                  if attr and attr.HasTextColour(): 
6709                      separatorPen = wx.Pen(attr.GetTextColour(), 1) 
6710                  else: 
6711                      separatorPen = self._separatorPen 
6712              else: 
6713                  separatorPen = wx.GREY_PEN 
6714                       
6715              dc.SetPen(separatorPen) 
6716              dc.DrawLine(item.GetX()+2, item.GetY()+total_h/2, w, item.GetY()+total_h/2) 
6717              dc.SetPen(oldPen) 
6718               
6719          # restore normal font 
6720          dc.SetFont(self._normalFont) 

6721           
6722   
6723      # Now y stands for the top of the item, whereas it used to stand for middle ! 

6724 -    def PaintLevel(self, item, dc, level, y, align): 

6725          """ 
6726          Paint a level in the hierarchy of L{CustomTreeCtrl}. 
6727   
6728          :param `item`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}; 
6729          :param `dc`: an instance of `wx.DC`; 
6730          :param integer `level`: the item level in the tree hierarchy; 
6731          :param integer `y`: the current vertical position in the `wx.PyScrolledWindow`; 
6732          :param integer `align`: an integer specifying the alignment type: 
6733   
6734           =============== ========================================= 
6735           `align` Value   Description 
6736           =============== ========================================= 
6737                  0        No horizontal alignment of windows (in items with windows). 
6738                  1        Windows (in items with windows) are aligned at the same horizontal position. 
6739                  2        Windows (in items with windows) are aligned at the rightmost edge of L{CustomTreeCtrl}. 
6740           =============== ========================================= 
6741   
6742          """ 
6743   
6744          x = level*self._indent 
6745   
6746          left_image_list = 0 
6747          if self._imageListLeft: 
6748              left_image_list += self._imageListLeft.GetBitmap(0).GetWidth() 
6749               
6750          x += left_image_list 
6751           
6752          if not self.HasAGWFlag(TR_HIDE_ROOT): 
6753           
6754              x += self._indent 
6755           
6756          elif level == 0: 
6757           
6758              # always expand hidden root 
6759              origY = y 
6760              children = item.GetChildren() 
6761              count = len(children) 
6762               
6763              if count > 0: 
6764                  n = 0 
6765                  while n < count: 
6766                      oldY = y 
6767                      y = self.PaintLevel(children[n], dc, 1, y, align) 
6768                      n = n + 1 
6769   
6770                  if not self.HasAGWFlag(TR_NO_LINES) and self.HasAGWFlag(TR_LINES_AT_ROOT) and count > 0: 
6771                   
6772                      # draw line down to last child 
6773                      origY += self.GetLineHeight(children[0])>>1 
6774                      oldY += self.GetLineHeight(children[n-1])>>1 
6775                      oldPen = dc.GetPen() 
6776                      dc.SetPen(self._dottedPen) 
6777                      dc.DrawLine(3, origY, 3, oldY) 
6778                      dc.SetPen(oldPen) 
6779                   
6780              return y 
6781           
6782          item.SetX(x+self._spacing) 
6783          item.SetY(y) 
6784   
6785          h = self.GetLineHeight(item) 
6786          y_top = y 
6787          y_mid = y_top + (h>>1) 
6788          y += h 
6789   
6790          exposed_x = dc.LogicalToDeviceX(0) 
6791          exposed_y = dc.LogicalToDeviceY(y_top) 
6792   
6793          if self.IsExposed(exposed_x, exposed_y, 10000, h):  # 10000 = very much 
6794              if wx.Platform == "__WXMAC__": 
6795                  # don't draw rect outline if we already have the 
6796                  # background colour under Mac 
6797                  pen = ((item.IsSelected() and self._hasFocus) and [self._borderPen] or [wx.TRANSPARENT_PEN])[0] 
6798              else: 
6799                  pen = self._borderPen 
6800   
6801              if item.IsSelected(): 
6802                  if (wx.Platform == "__WXMAC__" and self._hasFocus): 
6803                      colText = wx.SystemSettings_GetColour(wx.SYS_COLOUR_HIGHLIGHTTEXT) 
6804                  else: 
6805                      colText = wx.SystemSettings_GetColour(wx.SYS_COLOUR_HIGHLIGHTTEXT) 
6806              else: 
6807                  attr = item.GetAttributes() 
6808                  if attr and attr.HasTextColour(): 
6809                      colText = attr.GetTextColour() 
6810                  else: 
6811                      colText = self.GetForegroundColour() 
6812   
6813              if self._vistaselection: 
6814                  colText = wx.BLACK 
6815               
6816              # prepare to draw 
6817              dc.SetTextForeground(colText) 
6818              dc.SetPen(pen) 
6819              oldpen = pen 
6820   
6821              # draw 
6822              self.PaintItem(item, dc, level, align) 
6823   
6824              if self.HasAGWFlag(TR_ROW_LINES): 
6825               
6826                  # if the background colour is white, choose a 
6827                  # contrasting colour for the lines 
6828                  medium_grey = wx.Pen(wx.Colour(200, 200, 200)) 
6829                  dc.SetPen(((self.GetBackgroundColour() == wx.WHITE) and [medium_grey] or [wx.WHITE_PEN])[0]) 
6830                  dc.DrawLine(0, y_top, 10000, y_top) 
6831                  dc.DrawLine(0, y, 10000, y) 
6832               
6833              # restore DC objects 
6834              dc.SetBrush(wx.WHITE_BRUSH) 
6835              dc.SetTextForeground(wx.BLACK) 
6836   
6837              if not self.HasAGWFlag(TR_NO_LINES): 
6838               
6839                  # draw the horizontal line here 
6840                  dc.SetPen(self._dottedPen) 
6841                  x_start = x 
6842                  if x > self._indent+left_image_list: 
6843                      x_start -= self._indent 
6844                  elif self.HasAGWFlag(TR_LINES_AT_ROOT): 
6845                      x_start = 3 
6846                  dc.DrawLine(x_start, y_mid, x + self._spacing, y_mid) 
6847                  dc.SetPen(oldpen)             
6848   
6849              # should the item show a button? 
6850              if item.HasPlus() and self.HasButtons(): 
6851               
6852                  if self._imageListButtons: 
6853                   
6854                      # draw the image button here 
6855                      image_h = 0 
6856                      image_w = 0 
6857                      image = (item.IsExpanded() and [TreeItemIcon_Expanded] or [TreeItemIcon_Normal])[0] 
6858                      if item.IsSelected(): 
6859                          image += TreeItemIcon_Selected - TreeItemIcon_Normal 
6860   
6861                      image_w, image_h = self._imageListButtons.GetSize(image) 
6862                      xx = x - image_w/2 
6863                      yy = y_mid - image_h/2 
6864   
6865                      dc.SetClippingRegion(xx, yy, image_w, image_h) 
6866                      self._imageListButtons.Draw(image, dc, xx, yy, 
6867                                                  wx.IMAGELIST_DRAW_TRANSPARENT) 
6868                      dc.DestroyClippingRegion() 
6869                       
6870                  else: # no custom buttons 
6871   
6872                      if self.HasAGWFlag(TR_TWIST_BUTTONS): 
6873                          # We draw something like the Mac twist buttons 
6874                           
6875                          dc.SetPen(wx.BLACK_PEN) 
6876                          dc.SetBrush(self._hilightBrush) 
6877                          button = [wx.Point(), wx.Point(), wx.Point()] 
6878                           
6879                          if item.IsExpanded(): 
6880                              button[0].x = x - 5 
6881                              button[0].y = y_mid - 3 
6882                              button[1].x = x + 5 
6883                              button[1].y = button[0].y 
6884                              button[2].x = x 
6885                              button[2].y = button[0].y + 6 
6886                          else: 
6887                              button[0].x = x - 3 
6888                              button[0].y = y_mid - 5 
6889                              button[1].x = button[0].x 
6890                              button[1].y = y_mid + 5 
6891                              button[2].x = button[0].x + 5 
6892                              button[2].y = y_mid 
6893                           
6894                          dc.DrawPolygon(button) 
6895   
6896                      else: 
6897                          # These are the standard wx.TreeCtrl buttons as wx.RendererNative knows 
6898                           
6899                          wImage = 9 
6900                          hImage = 9 
6901   
6902                          flag = 0 
6903   
6904                          if item.IsExpanded(): 
6905                              flag |= _CONTROL_EXPANDED 
6906                          if item == self._underMouse: 
6907                              flag |= _CONTROL_CURRENT 
6908   
6909                          self._drawingfunction(self, dc, wx.Rect(x - wImage/2, y_mid - hImage/2,wImage, hImage), flag) 
6910                   
6911          if item.IsExpanded(): 
6912           
6913              children = item.GetChildren() 
6914              count = len(children) 
6915               
6916              if count > 0: 
6917               
6918                  n = 0 
6919                  level = level + 1 
6920   
6921                  while n < count: 
6922                      oldY = y 
6923                      y = self.PaintLevel(children[n], dc, level, y, align) 
6924                      n = n + 1 
6925                       
6926                  if not self.HasAGWFlag(TR_NO_LINES) and count > 0: 
6927                   
6928                      # draw line down to last child 
6929                      oldY += self.GetLineHeight(children[n-1])>>1 
6930                      if self.HasButtons(): 
6931                          y_mid += 5 
6932   
6933                      # Only draw the portion of the line that is visible, in case it is huge 
6934                      xOrigin, yOrigin = dc.GetDeviceOrigin() 
6935                      yOrigin = abs(yOrigin) 
6936                      width, height = self.GetClientSize() 
6937   
6938                      # Move end points to the begining/end of the view? 
6939                      if y_mid < yOrigin: 
6940                          y_mid = yOrigin 
6941                      if oldY > yOrigin + height: 
6942                          oldY = yOrigin + height 
6943   
6944                      # after the adjustments if y_mid is larger than oldY then the line 
6945                      # isn't visible at all so don't draw anything 
6946                      if y_mid < oldY: 
6947                          dc.SetPen(self._dottedPen) 
6948                          dc.DrawLine(x, y_mid, x, oldY) 
6949                   
6950          return y

6957 -    def OnPaint(self, event): 

6958          """ 
6959          Handles the ``wx.EVT_PAINT`` event for L{CustomTreeCtrl}. 
6960   
6961          :param `event`: a `wx.PaintEvent` event to be processed. 
6962          """ 
6963   
6964          dc = wx.PaintDC(self) 
6965          self.PrepareDC(dc) 
6966   
6967          if not self._anchor: 
6968              return 
6969   
6970          dc.SetFont(self._normalFont) 
6971          dc.SetPen(self._dottedPen) 
6972   
6973          align = 0 
6974           
6975          if self.HasAGWFlag(TR_ALIGN_WINDOWS): 
6976              align = 1 
6977          elif self.HasAGWFlag(TR_ALIGN_WINDOWS_RIGHT): 
6978              align = 2 
6979               
6980          y = 2 
6981          self.PaintLevel(self._anchor, dc, 0, y, align) 

6982

6984 -    def OnSize(self, event): 

6985          """ 
6986          Handles the ``wx.EVT_SIZE`` event for L{CustomTreeCtrl}. 
6987   
6988          :param `event`: a `wx.SizeEvent` event to be processed. 
6989          """ 
6990   
6991          if self.HasAGWFlag(TR_ELLIPSIZE_LONG_ITEMS): 
6992              self.Refresh() 
6993              event.Skip() 
6994              return 
6995           
6996          if self.HasAGWFlag(TR_ALIGN_WINDOWS_RIGHT) and self._itemWithWindow: 
6997              self.RefreshItemWithWindows() 
6998          else: 
6999              self.RefreshSelected() 
7000               
7001          event.Skip() 

7002

7004 -    def OnEraseBackground(self, event): 

7005          """ 
7006          Handles the ``wx.EVT_ERASE_BACKGROUND`` event for L{CustomTreeCtrl}. 
7007   
7008          :param `event`: a `wx.EraseEvent` event to be processed. 
7009          """ 
7010   
7011          # Can we actually do something here (or in OnPaint()) To Handle 
7012          # background images that are stretchable or always centered? 
7013          # I tried but I get enormous flickering... 
7014           
7015          if not self._backgroundImage: 
7016              event.Skip() 
7017              return 
7018   
7019          if self._imageStretchStyle == _StyleTile: 
7020              dc = event.GetDC() 
7021   
7022              if not dc: 
7023                  dc = wx.ClientDC(self) 
7024                  rect = self.GetUpdateRegion().GetBox() 
7025                  dc.SetClippingRect(rect) 
7026   
7027              self.TileBackground(dc)

7030 -    def TileBackground(self, dc): 

7031          """ 
7032          Tiles the background image to fill all the available area. 
7033   
7034          :param `dc`: an instance of `wx.DC`. 
7035   
7036          :todo: Support background images also in stretch and centered modes.         
7037          """ 
7038   
7039          sz = self.GetClientSize() 
7040          w = self._backgroundImage.GetWidth() 
7041          h = self._backgroundImage.GetHeight() 
7042   
7043          x = 0 
7044   
7045          while x < sz.width: 
7046              y = 0 
7047   
7048              while y < sz.height: 
7049                  dc.DrawBitmap(self._backgroundImage, x, y, True) 
7050                  y = y + h 
7051   
7052              x = x + w         

7053           
7054   

7055 -    def OnSetFocus(self, event): 

7056          """ 
7057          Handles the ``wx.EVT_SET_FOCUS`` event for L{CustomTreeCtrl}. 
7058   
7059          :param `event`: a `wx.FocusEvent` event to be processed. 
7060          """ 
7061   
7062          self._hasFocus = True 
7063          self.RefreshSelected() 
7064          event.Skip() 

7065

7067 -    def OnKillFocus(self, event): 

7068          """ 
7069          Handles the ``wx.EVT_KILL_FOCUS`` event for L{CustomTreeCtrl}. 
7070   
7071          :param `event`: a `wx.FocusEvent` event to be processed. 
7072          """ 
7073   
7074          self._hasFocus = False 
7075          self.RefreshSelected() 
7076          event.Skip()

7079 -    def OnKeyDown(self, event): 

7080          """ 
7081          Handles the ``wx.EVT_KEY_DOWN`` event for L{CustomTreeCtrl}, sending a 
7082          ``EVT_TREE_KEY_DOWN`` event. 
7083   
7084          :param `event`: a `wx.KeyEvent` event to be processed. 
7085          """ 
7086   
7087          te = TreeEvent(wxEVT_TREE_KEY_DOWN, self.GetId()) 
7088          te._evtKey = event 
7089          te.SetEventObject(self) 
7090           
7091          if self.GetEventHandler().ProcessEvent(te): 
7092              # intercepted by the user code 
7093              return 
7094   
7095          if self._current is None or self._key_current is None: 
7096           
7097              self._current = self._key_current = self.GetFirstVisibleItem() 
7098           
7099          # how should the selection work for this event? 
7100          is_multiple, extended_select, unselect_others = EventFlagsToSelType(self.GetAGWWindowStyleFlag(), 
7101                                                                              event.ShiftDown(), event.CmdDown()) 
7102   
7103          # + : Expand 
7104          # - : Collaspe 
7105          # * : Expand all/Collapse all 
7106          # ' ' | return : activate 
7107          # up    : go up (not last children!) 
7108          # down  : go down 
7109          # left  : go to parent 
7110          # right : open if parent and go next 
7111          # home  : go to root 
7112          # end   : go to last item without opening parents 
7113          # alnum : start or continue searching for the item with this prefix 
7114           
7115          keyCode = event.GetKeyCode() 
7116   
7117          if keyCode in [ord("+"), wx.WXK_ADD]:       # "+" 
7118              if self._current.HasPlus() and not self.IsExpanded(self._current) and self.IsItemEnabled(self._current): 
7119                  self.Expand(self._current) 
7120                   
7121          elif keyCode in [ord("*"), wx.WXK_MULTIPLY]:  # "*" 
7122              if not self.IsExpanded(self._current) and self.IsItemEnabled(self._current): 
7123                  # expand all 
7124                  self.ExpandAll(self._current) 
7125   
7126          elif keyCode in [ord("-"), wx.WXK_SUBTRACT]:  # "-" 
7127              if self.IsExpanded(self._current): 
7128                  self.Collapse(self._current) 
7129               
7130          elif keyCode == wx.WXK_MENU: 
7131              # Use the item's bounding rectangle to determine position for the event 
7132              itemRect = self.GetBoundingRect(self._current, True) 
7133              event = TreeEvent(wxEVT_TREE_ITEM_MENU, self.GetId()) 
7134              event._item = self._current 
7135              # Use the left edge, vertical middle 
7136              event._pointDrag = wx.Point(itemRect.GetX(), itemRect.GetY() + itemRect.GetHeight()/2) 
7137              event.SetEventObject(self) 
7138              self.GetEventHandler().ProcessEvent(event) 
7139                   
7140          elif keyCode in [wx.WXK_RETURN, wx.WXK_SPACE, wx.WXK_NUMPAD_ENTER]: 
7141   
7142              if not self.IsItemEnabled(self._current): 
7143                  event.Skip() 
7144                  return 
7145               
7146              if not (event.HasModifiers() or event.CmdDown()): 
7147                  event = TreeEvent(wxEVT_TREE_ITEM_ACTIVATED, self.GetId()) 
7148                  event._item = self._current 
7149                  event.SetEventObject(self) 
7150                  self.GetEventHandler().ProcessEvent(event) 
7151   
7152                  if keyCode == wx.WXK_SPACE and self.GetItemType(self._current) > 0: 
7153                      if self.IsItem3State(self._current): 
7154                          checked = self.GetItem3StateValue(self._current) 
7155                          checked = (checked+1)%3 
7156                      else: 
7157                          checked = not self.IsItemChecked(self._current) 
7158                           
7159                      self.CheckItem(self._current, checked) 
7160           
7161              # in any case, also generate the normal key event for this key, 
7162              # even if we generated the ACTIVATED event above: this is what 
7163              # wxMSW does and it makes sense because you might not want to 
7164              # process ACTIVATED event at all and handle Space and Return 
7165              # directly (and differently) which would be impossible otherwise 
7166              event.Skip() 
7167   
7168          # up goes to the previous sibling or to the last 
7169          # of its children if it's expanded 
7170          elif keyCode == wx.WXK_UP: 
7171              prev = self.GetPrevSibling(self._key_current) 
7172              if not prev: 
7173                  prev = self.GetItemParent(self._key_current) 
7174                  if prev == self.GetRootItem() and self.HasAGWFlag(TR_HIDE_ROOT): 
7175                      return 
7176                   
7177                  if prev: 
7178                      current = self._key_current 
7179                      # TODO: Huh?  If we get here, we'd better be the first child of our parent.  How else could it be? 
7180                      if current == self.GetFirstChild(prev)[0] and self.IsItemEnabled(prev): 
7181                          # otherwise we return to where we came from 
7182                          self.DoSelectItem(prev, unselect_others, extended_select) 
7183                          self._key_current = prev 
7184                   
7185              else: 
7186                  current = self._key_current 
7187                   
7188                  # We are going to another parent node 
7189                  while self.IsExpanded(prev) and self.HasChildren(prev): 
7190                      child = self.GetLastChild(prev) 
7191                      if child: 
7192                          prev = child 
7193                          current = prev 
7194                   
7195                  # Try to get the previous siblings and see if they are active 
7196                  while prev and not self.IsItemEnabled(prev): 
7197                      prev = self.GetPrevSibling(prev) 
7198   
7199                  if not prev: 
7200                      # No previous siblings active: go to the parent and up 
7201                      prev = self.GetItemParent(current) 
7202                      while prev and not self.IsItemEnabled(prev): 
7203                          prev = self.GetItemParent(prev) 
7204                           
7205                  if prev: 
7206                      self.DoSelectItem(prev, unselect_others, extended_select) 
7207                      self._key_current = prev 
7208   
7209          # left arrow goes to the parent 
7210          elif keyCode == wx.WXK_LEFT: 
7211               
7212              prev = self.GetItemParent(self._current) 
7213              if prev == self.GetRootItem() and self.HasAGWFlag(TR_HIDE_ROOT):             
7214                  # don't go to root if it is hidden 
7215                  prev = self.GetPrevSibling(self._current) 
7216   
7217              if self.IsExpanded(self._current): 
7218                  self.Collapse(self._current) 
7219              else: 
7220                  if prev and self.IsItemEnabled(prev): 
7221                      self.DoSelectItem(prev, unselect_others, extended_select) 
7222                   
7223          elif keyCode == wx.WXK_RIGHT: 
7224              # this works the same as the down arrow except that we 
7225              # also expand the item if it wasn't expanded yet 
7226              if self.IsExpanded(self._current) and self.HasChildren(self._current): 
7227                  child, cookie = self.GetFirstChild(self._key_current) 
7228                  if self.IsItemEnabled(child): 
7229                      self.DoSelectItem(child, unselect_others, extended_select) 
7230                      self._key_current = child 
7231              else: 
7232                  self.Expand(self._current) 
7233              # fall through 
7234   
7235          elif keyCode == wx.WXK_DOWN: 
7236              if self.IsExpanded(self._key_current) and self.HasChildren(self._key_current): 
7237   
7238                  child = self.GetNextActiveItem(self._key_current) 
7239                   
7240                  if child: 
7241                      self.DoSelectItem(child, unselect_others, extended_select) 
7242                      self._key_current = child    
7243                   
7244              else: 
7245                   
7246                  next = self.GetNextSibling(self._key_current) 
7247       
7248                  if not next: 
7249                      current = self._key_current 
7250                      while current and not next: 
7251                          current = self.GetItemParent(current) 
7252                          if current: 
7253                              next = self.GetNextSibling(current) 
7254                              if not next or not self.IsItemEnabled(next): 
7255                                  next = None 
7256   
7257                  else: 
7258                      while next and not self.IsItemEnabled(next): 
7259                          next = self.GetNext(next) 
7260                       
7261                  if next: 
7262                      self.DoSelectItem(next, unselect_others, extended_select) 
7263                      self._key_current = next 
7264                       
7265   
7266          # <End> selects the last visible tree item 
7267          elif keyCode == wx.WXK_END: 
7268               
7269              last = self.GetRootItem() 
7270   
7271              while last and self.IsExpanded(last): 
7272               
7273                  lastChild = self.GetLastChild(last) 
7274   
7275                  # it may happen if the item was expanded but then all of 
7276                  # its children have been deleted - so IsExpanded() returned 
7277                  # true, but GetLastChild() returned invalid item 
7278                  if not lastChild: 
7279                      break 
7280   
7281                  last = lastChild 
7282               
7283              if last and self.IsItemEnabled(last): 
7284               
7285                  self.DoSelectItem(last, unselect_others, extended_select) 
7286                   
7287          # <Home> selects the root item 
7288          elif keyCode == wx.WXK_HOME: 
7289                   
7290              prev = self.GetRootItem() 
7291               
7292              if not prev: 
7293                  return 
7294   
7295              if self.HasAGWFlag(TR_HIDE_ROOT): 
7296                  prev, cookie = self.GetFirstChild(prev) 
7297                  if not prev: 
7298                      return 
7299   
7300              if self.IsItemEnabled(prev): 
7301                  self.DoSelectItem(prev, unselect_others, extended_select) 
7302           
7303          else: 
7304               
7305              if not event.HasModifiers() and ((keyCode >= ord('0') and keyCode <= ord('9')) or \ 
7306                                               (keyCode >= ord('a') and keyCode <= ord('z')) or \ 
7307                                               (keyCode >= ord('A') and keyCode <= ord('Z'))): 
7308               
7309                  # find the next item starting with the given prefix 
7310                  ch = chr(keyCode) 
7311                  id = self.FindItem(self._current, self._findPrefix + ch) 
7312                   
7313                  if not id: 
7314                      # no such item 
7315                      return 
7316   
7317                  if self.IsItemEnabled(id):                 
7318                      self.SelectItem(id) 
7319                  self._findPrefix += ch 
7320   
7321                  # also start the timer to reset the current prefix if the user 
7322                  # doesn't press any more alnum keys soon -- we wouldn't want 
7323                  # to use this prefix for a new item search 
7324                  if not self._findTimer: 
7325                      self._findTimer = TreeFindTimer(self) 
7326                   
7327                  self._findTimer.Start(_DELAY, wx.TIMER_ONE_SHOT) 
7328               
7329              else: 
7330               
7331                  event.Skip() 

7332   
7333   

7334 -    def GetNextActiveItem(self, item, down=True): 

7335          """ 
7336          Returns the next active item. Used Internally at present. 
7337   
7338          :param `item`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}; 
7339          :param bool `down`: ``True`` to search downwards in the hierarchy for an active item, 
7340           ``False`` to search upwards. 
7341   
7342          :return: An instance of L{GenericTreeItem} if an active item has been found or 
7343           ``None`` if none has been found. 
7344          """ 
7345           
7346          if down: 
7347              sibling = self.GetNextSibling 
7348          else: 
7349              sibling = self.GetPrevSibling 
7350                   
7351          if self.GetItemType(item) == 2 and not self.IsItemChecked(item): 
7352              # Is an unchecked radiobutton... all its children are inactive 
7353              # try to get the next/previous sibling 
7354              found = 0                  
7355   
7356              while 1: 
7357                  child = sibling(item) 
7358                  if (child and self.IsItemEnabled(child)) or not child: 
7359                      break 
7360                  item = child 
7361   
7362          else: 
7363              # Tha's not a radiobutton... but some of its children can be 
7364              # inactive 
7365              child, cookie = self.GetFirstChild(item) 
7366              while child and not self.IsItemEnabled(child): 
7367                  child, cookie = self.GetNextChild(item, cookie) 
7368                   
7369          if child and self.IsItemEnabled(child): 
7370              return child 
7371               
7372          return None 

7373       
7374   

7375 -    def HitTest(self, point, flags=0): 

7376          """ 
7377          Calculates which (if any) item is under the given point, returning the tree item 
7378          at this point plus extra information flags. 
7379   
7380          :param `point`: an instance of `wx.Point`, a point to test for hits; 
7381          :param integer `flags`: a bitlist of the following values: 
7382   
7383           ================================== =============== ================================= 
7384           HitTest Flags                      Hex Value       Description 
7385           ================================== =============== ================================= 
7386           ``TREE_HITTEST_ABOVE``                         0x1 Above the client area 
7387           ``TREE_HITTEST_BELOW``                         0x2 Below the client area 
7388           ``TREE_HITTEST_NOWHERE``                       0x4 No item has been hit 
7389           ``TREE_HITTEST_ONITEMBUTTON``                  0x8 On the button associated to an item 
7390           ``TREE_HITTEST_ONITEMICON``                   0x10 On the icon associated to an item 
7391           ``TREE_HITTEST_ONITEMINDENT``                 0x20 On the indent associated to an item 
7392           ``TREE_HITTEST_ONITEMLABEL``                  0x40 On the label (string) associated to an item 
7393           ``TREE_HITTEST_ONITEM``                       0x50 Anywhere on the item 
7394           ``TREE_HITTEST_ONITEMRIGHT``                  0x80 On the right of the label associated to an item 
7395           ``TREE_HITTEST_TOLEFT``                      0x200 On the left of the client area 
7396           ``TREE_HITTEST_TORIGHT``                     0x400 On the right of the client area 
7397           ``TREE_HITTEST_ONITEMUPPERPART``             0x800 On the upper part (first half) of the item 
7398           ``TREE_HITTEST_ONITEMLOWERPART``            0x1000 On the lower part (second half) of the item 
7399           ``TREE_HITTEST_ONITEMCHECKICON``            0x2000 On the check/radio icon, if present 
7400           ================================== =============== ================================= 
7401   
7402          :return: A tuple with the first value being an instance of L{GenericTreeItem} or ``None`` if 
7403           no item has been hit-tested, and as second value an integer parameter `flag`. 
7404   
7405          :note: both the item (if any, ``None`` otherwise) and the `flags` are always returned as a tuple. 
7406          """ 
7407           
7408          w, h = self.GetSize() 
7409          flags = 0 
7410           
7411          if point.x < 0: 
7412              flags |= TREE_HITTEST_TOLEFT 
7413          if point.x > w: 
7414              flags |= TREE_HITTEST_TORIGHT 
7415          if point.y < 0: 
7416              flags |= TREE_HITTEST_ABOVE 
7417          if point.y > h: 
7418              flags |= TREE_HITTEST_BELOW 
7419   
7420          if flags: 
7421              return None, flags 
7422    
7423          if self._anchor == None: 
7424              flags = TREE_HITTEST_NOWHERE 
7425              return None, flags 
7426           
7427          hit, flags = self._anchor.HitTest(self.CalcUnscrolledPosition(point), self, flags, 0) 
7428   
7429          if hit == None:         
7430              flags = TREE_HITTEST_NOWHERE 
7431              return None, flags 
7432   
7433          if not self.IsItemEnabled(hit): 
7434              return None, flags 
7435   
7436          return hit, flags 

7437   
7438   

7439 -    def GetBoundingRect(self, item, textOnly=False): 

7440          """ 
7441          Retrieves the rectangle bounding the item. 
7442   
7443          :param `item`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}; 
7444          :param bool `textOnly`: if ``True``, only the rectangle around the item's label will 
7445           be returned, otherwise the item's image is also taken into account. 
7446   
7447          :return: An instance of `wx.Rect`. 
7448           
7449          :note: The rectangle coordinates are logical, not physical ones. So, for example, 
7450           the `x` coordinate may be negative if the tree has a horizontal scrollbar and its 
7451           position is not ``0``. 
7452          """ 
7453       
7454          i = item 
7455   
7456          startX, startY = self.GetViewStart() 
7457          rect = wx.Rect() 
7458   
7459          rect.x = i.GetX() - startX*_PIXELS_PER_UNIT 
7460          rect.y = i.GetY() - startY*_PIXELS_PER_UNIT 
7461          rect.width = i.GetWidth() 
7462          rect.height = self.GetLineHeight(i) 
7463   
7464          return rect 

7465   
7466   

7467 -    def Edit(self, item): 

7468          """ 
7469          Internal function. Starts the editing of an item label, sending a 
7470          ``EVT_TREE_BEGIN_LABEL_EDIT`` event. 
7471   
7472          :param `item`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}. 
7473   
7474          :warning: Separator-type items can not be edited.         
7475          """ 
7476   
7477          if item.IsSeparator(): 
7478              return 
7479           
7480          te = TreeEvent(wxEVT_TREE_BEGIN_LABEL_EDIT, self.GetId()) 
7481          te._item = item 
7482          te.SetEventObject(self) 
7483          if self.GetEventHandler().ProcessEvent(te) and not te.IsAllowed(): 
7484              # vetoed by user 
7485              return 
7486       
7487          # We have to call this here because the label in 
7488          # question might just have been added and no screen 
7489          # update taken place. 
7490          if self._dirty: 
7491              if wx.Platform in ["__WXMSW__", "__WXMAC__"]: 
7492                  self.Update() 
7493              else: 
7494                  wx.YieldIfNeeded() 
7495   
7496          if self._editCtrl != None and item != self._editCtrl.item(): 
7497              self._editCtrl.StopEditing() 
7498   
7499          self._editCtrl = TreeTextCtrl(self, item=item) 
7500          self._editCtrl.SetFocus() 

7501   
7502    

7503 -    def GetEditControl(self): 

7504          """ 
7505          Returns a pointer to the edit L{TreeTextCtrl} if the item is being edited or 
7506          ``None`` otherwise (it is assumed that no more than one item may be edited 
7507          simultaneously).         
7508          """ 
7509           
7510          return self._editCtrl 

7511   
7512   

7513 -    def OnAcceptEdit(self, item, value): 

7514          """ 
7515          Called by L{TreeTextCtrl}, to accept the changes and to send the 
7516          ``EVT_TREE_END_LABEL_EDIT`` event. 
7517   
7518          :param `item`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}; 
7519          :param string `value`: the new value of the item label. 
7520   
7521          :return: ``True`` if the editing has not been vetoed, ``False`` otherwise.         
7522          """ 
7523   
7524          le = TreeEvent(wxEVT_TREE_END_LABEL_EDIT, self.GetId()) 
7525          le._item = item 
7526          le.SetEventObject(self) 
7527          le._label = value 
7528          le._editCancelled = False 
7529   
7530          return not self.GetEventHandler().ProcessEvent(le) or le.IsAllowed() 

7531       
7532   

7533 -    def OnCancelEdit(self, item): 

7534          """ 
7535          Called by L{TreeTextCtrl}, to cancel the changes and to send the 
7536          ``EVT_TREE_END_LABEL_EDIT`` event. 
7537   
7538          :param `item`: an instance of L{GenericTreeItem}.         
7539          """ 
7540   
7541          # let owner know that the edit was cancelled 
7542          le = TreeEvent(wxEVT_TREE_END_LABEL_EDIT, self.GetId()) 
7543          le._item = item 
7544          le.SetEventObject(self) 
7545          le._label = "" 
7546          le._editCancelled = True 
7547   
7548          self.GetEventHandler().ProcessEvent(le) 

7549   
7550   

7551 -    def OnEditTimer(self): 

7552          """ The timer for editing has expired. Start editing. """ 
7553           
7554          self.Edit(self._current)
